articles.author: Marshall Cohen
articles.title: Philadelphia DA sues Elon Musk and his super PAC over $1M sweepstakes - CNN
articles.description: Philadelphia’s district attorney asked a state judge on Monday to shut down tech billionaire Elon Musk’s controversial $1 million giveaway to registered voters, calling it an “illegal lottery scheme.”
articles.content:

articles.title: DJT stock skyrockets following Donald Trump's inflammatory MSG rally as election looms - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Trump Media & Technology Group stock extended its five-week rally on Monday as investors bet on the former president winning the US election.
